member.name: T:Allocate.Web.ApiTemplate.Controllers.OurControllerBase
member.summary: This is a template ControllerBase for an API's Controllers. Every API Controller in a Web API project should extend this base class, so that we can apply all the Attributes and Filters in just one place.
